entries.title: serenity
entries.content: Serenity Serenity Goomshroom 4 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange30 ft radius burst, centered on casterDuration3 roundsSaveWill You compel the enemies around you to cease fighting. Enemies are pacified (will negates). They get a new save against this effect each round. If an ally harms a pacified enemy, they get an additional save to end the effect.

entries.title: fairy-ring-retreat
entries.content: Fairy Ring Retreat Fairy Ring Retreat Goomshroom 6 Cast Time - 1 Minute EffectRangeReach You conjure up an extra-dimensional meadow that can be accessed from a single entrance on the plane from which the spell was cast. The entry point looks like a circle of toadstools enclosing a 10ft circle. The meadow itself is a one mile radius. Only those you designate can enter through the portal. You can designate a creature by carving its name into a special tree inside of the meadow. As a standard action you can banish a creature from your dimension. Once a visitor has passed through the entry point, they find themselves in an idyllic twilight meadow decorated with mushrooms surrounded by an impassable grove. The atmosphere is clean, fresh, and warm. The caster can configure the meadow into any shape desires with rolling hills and flowing rivers. The place is comfortable and temperate. The trees can provide enough food to sustain 20 people a day. A staff of 10 spectral animal or fey-like servants wait upon all who enter. They can perform simple tasks and can go anywhere in the meadow. Since the place can be entered only through its special portal, outside conditions do not affect the meadow, nor do conditions inside it pass to the plane beyond. A caster can only have one instance of this spell active at once. If they cast the spell again, it only moves the portal. Because this is a physical tangible location, things can be brought in and out of the portal. Like all extra-dimensional spaces, creatures can use plane shift (wild card 4) to teleport directly into the plane.

entries.title: README
entries.content: Level 6

entries.title: level-5
entries.content: Level 5

entries.title: README
entries.content: Goomshroom The Shoomlette is an entity that represents the bond between gooms, a breed of squishy draconic creatures, and shroomkin, a race of people with close ties to fey and mushrooms. These two entities live in tandem with each other with one main goal: increase the quantity of happiness in the world. The tactics they use to do so is to subdue creatures that decrease happiness and physically change the world around them to make it a better place to live. Shroomlette spells either inspire teamwork or incapacitate creatures in some way, often through the manipulation of water. Includes many oddities mimicking the special abilities of gooms and shrooms.

entries.title: dream
entries.content: Dream Dream \[buff] Larella 1 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRangeInfiniteTarget1 creatureDuration30 minutes You enter a trance like state as you try to intercept the thoughts of a specific named sleeping creature. You can remain in this trance as long as you'd like, waiting for the target creature to fall asleep. When they do, the spells duration begins and you appear in their dreams. You can make conversation with them, but the creature is under no compulsion to speak with you and can handily boot you out of their dreams. While interacting with a creature in a dream, you get a +2 bonus to skill checks. {% hint style="info" %} Creatures like elves with the trance racial feature always realize when they're being contacted by a dream spell. They can take a moment to center themselves, enter trance and allow the spell to take hold. {% endhint %}

entries.title: levitate
entries.content: Levitate Levitate \[buff] Larella 1 Cast Time - 1 Swift Action EffectTargetSelfDurationUntil Rest You decide gravity isn't your thing today. You gain a hover speed equal to your speed.

entries.title: mind-crush
entries.content: Mind Crush Mind Crush \[mind-affecting] \[psychic] \[upcast] Larella 1 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange30 ftTarget1 CreatureSaveWill You overload a creatures brain with information, giving them a hell of a headache. They take 2d8+CL (9+CL) psychic damage (will halves). Upcast - The target takes d6+CL (3+CL) damage again at the end of its next turn (will halves). Each mana spent adds an additional turn. A creature cannot suffer from multiple mind crushes at the same time.

entries.title: mind-link
entries.content: Mind Link Mind Link \[mind-affecting] Larella 1 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRangeReachTarget1 Creature With a touch, communicate a vast quantity of information by showing the target brief memories and psychic impressions. You can communicate the broad strokes of an experience you had, including important locations, people, events and feelings. The experience must be shorter than 1 hour. Casting on an unwilling creature requires an attack roll.

entries.title: psychic-reading
entries.content: Psychic Reading Psychic Reading \[mind-affecting] \[subtle] \[concentration] Larella 1 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange30 ftTarget1 CreatureDuration3 rounds You focus on a creature's aura to learn more information about them. Roll a CL check, DC 10+(creature's lvl). If you succeed, you can learn information from their aura, and even more by concentrating. Every round you learn a piece of information about it from the following list (caster's choice). * Sexual Orientation * Race/Species * Gender * Level * Native Language * Place of Origin (usually only general, like country) * Age You can only cast this spell on a given creature once per day.

entries.title: README
entries.content: Level 1

entries.title: sending
entries.content: Sending Sending Larella 1 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRangeInfiniteTarget1 Creature You deliver a message to a creature over any distance. In order to communicate with a creature, you must have met them, and you must know their name. When you cast the spell, you telepathically communicate simple ideas that require no more than two sentences to convey (Monsters are attacking the north gate. How do we respond?). Your target can reply with the same restrictions. If your message is too complex or too long, the creature is dead, or the creature is on another plane then it gets lost in the ether and the caster takes 1 psychic damage. You can only cast sending on a particular creature once each day unless you \[mana burn] 1. Upcast 3 - By adding \[mana burn] you can instead have a conversation with this creature that either of you can cut off at any moment. The spells duration is instead 10 minutes.

entries.title: concentrated-blast
entries.content: Concentrated Blast Concentrated Blast \[force]  Larella 2 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange60 ftTarget1 creature {% hint style="info" %} This spell can only be cast when concentrating on a spell.  {% endhint %} Release your mind from the strain of concentration, channeling this raw mental energy at a target within range. Make an attack that deals 3d10+CL (16+CL) psychic damage. This spell immediately ends the spell you were concentrating on, immediately restoring the ended spells mana cost. If you are concentrating on multiple spells at once, you can end both spells to restore more mana. Upcast - For each additional mana spent, increase dmg by d10 (5).

entries.title: cull-the-weak
entries.content: Cull the Weak Cull the Weak \[psychic] \[buff]  Larella 2 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectTargetSelfDurationUntil Rest You sense weakness in your enemies. Whenever a creature falls below (CL) hp, you know. You can spend 1 mana and an immediate action to pounce on this weakness, dealing CL psychic damage to them. If they currently under the effect on one of your spells, this can be done as an instant action.

entries.title: detect-thoughts
entries.content: Detect Thoughts Detect Thoughts \[concentration] \[mind-affecting] \[subtle] Larella 2 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange30 ftTarget1 creatureDuration10 minutesSaveWill Every turn as a standard action you can scan a creature you can see. You can read the surface thoughts of the creature for as long as you desire (will negates), requiring no additional action. The spell gives you the mental capacity to have a conversation with the creature and hear its thoughts at the same time.

entries.title: memory-lapse
entries.content: Memory Lapse Memory Lapse \[mind-affecting] \[subtle] Larella 2 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange30 ftTarget1 creatureSaveWill You cause a target to forget the events that have transpired in the past 2 rounds of combat (12 seconds). Certain details may cause them to recall what you did during that time, such as seeing you in a restricted area, or an ally reminding them.

entries.title: README
entries.content: Level 2

entries.title: share-memory
entries.content: Share Memory Share Memory \[concentration] \[mind-affecting] Larella 2 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRangeReachTarget1 creatureSaveWill With a touch, you can tap into your targets memories (will negates) or your own, decided when you initiate mental contact. In any case, both parties see what is being viewed. The memory is limited to one minute duration. If gazing into another creatures memories, you must specify the type of memory or specific memory you want to look at.

entries.title: dream-council
entries.content: Dream Council Dream Council \[buff] Larella 3 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRangeInfiniteTargetUp to 10 creaturesDuration30 minutes You enter a trance like state as you try to intercept the thoughts of up to 10 specific named sleeping creatures. You can remain in this trance as long as you'd like, waiting for the target creature(s) to fall asleep. When they do, you and any creatures you specify enter a shared dream space where you can make conversation with them. The creatures are under no compulsion to speak with you and can leave the dream space at any time. Using the spell typically requires coordination beforehand in order to get everybody to attend the council. The duration of the spell starts when you contact at least one creature. While interacting with a creature in a dream, you get a +2 bonus to skill checks.

entries.title: mirror-realm
entries.content: Mirror Realm Mirror Realm Larella 3 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action Focus - 1 roughly person-sized mirror EffectRange30 ftTarget1 mirror/1 creatureDuration24 hours, 1 minuteSaveWill This spell has two functions, trapping for combat and hosteling for shenanigans. In either case, you must target a mirror. When you do so, the contents of the mirror are set in stone and cease to reflect reality, instead creating its own little world that resembles what it reflected. Hosteling You cast this version on a mirror in order to create an extradimensional space with some interesting quirks. The space itself is a copy of everything within a 30ft distance from the mirror. This means the mirror realm can capture entire rooms, including things that are hidden from line of sight (such as behind furniture) This allows your extradimensional space to contain furniture for instance. No effects can come in or out of the mirror realm, but both sides can see what is on the other side of the mirror, barring any kind of physical obstructions that would prevent sight (such as drapery). By tapping on the mirror from either side you can cause the noise to carry over. On casting the spell you can include a password that needs to be spoken in order to walk into the mirror (no action). This password can be changed with 1 minute of concentration from the caster. You can also update the mirror's appearance to keep it inconspicuous should the environment change drastically. The caster can go blind and deaf temporarily to project their senses into the mirror realm at will indefinitely. Objects cannot be brought out, nor can objects be brought in aside from what the average humanoid can reasonably carry on their person. Any such objects left behind are shunted out, along with any creatures, if the mirror is destroyed or the spell ends. Can be made permanent using 2,000g worth of powdered rare metals as an addition material component during casting Trapping When casting the trapping form, you must target a creature AND an appropriately sized mirror (both of which need to be in range of you, but not each other). If the creature fails its save, it is immediately sucked into the mirror (with a similar setting as the aforementioned hosteling effect). No other creature can enter the mirror realm without another casting of this spell. This does not prevent it from taking actions, but it can no longer interact with anything outside of the mirror realm, nor can any creature interact with the trapped individual. The target is stranded. They can see out of the mirror by standing next to it. The only way they can escape is by having an ally destroy the mirror, or by waiting for 1 minute. In either case, the creature appears in a random space within 15 feet of the mirror's line of sight.

entries.title: README
entries.content: Level 3

entries.title: telekinetic-lift
entries.content: Telekinetic Lift Telekinetic Lift \[buff] \[upcast] Larella 3 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange30 ftTargetSelfDuration1 hour You exert your psychic power to manipulate heavy unattended objects within the spells range. You can lift objects weighing up to (100\*CL) pounds, having them float in the air around you. Lifting objects with this spell has the \[concentration] tag, but otherwise does not restrict your movement, occupy your hands etc. Upcast - Increase carrying capacity to (1000\*CL) lbs.

entries.title: telekinetic-maneuver
entries.content: Telekinetic Maneuver Telekinetic Maneuver \[buff] Larella 3 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange30 ftTargetSelfDuration1 minute As part of casting the spell and as a standard action for the spells duration, you can perform a combat maneuver using (CL+3) as your bonus. Some maneuvers work slightly differently as noted below. Drag - Move the creature to another position within the spells range, up to 30 ft. Grapple - While grappling, this spell also has the \[concentration] tag. Instead of dealing the damage of a held weapon, you instead deal 2d6+CL (7+CL) crush dmg each turn. You must spend your standard action to do this each turn or the grapple ends. You are not entangled while grappling. You do not need to pull the target adjacent to you. Any damage you take while concentrating also deals poise damage. If poise broken or moved out of range, this effect ends.

entries.title: malleable-memory
entries.content: Malleable Memory Malleable Memory \[mind-affecting] \[concentration] Larella 4 Cast Time - 1 See Text EffectRangeReachTarget1 creatureDuration10 minutesSaveWill You root around in the targets head, removing things and adding things to their memories. This spell has 2 functions. Alter Memories - You can change details about memories, or add entirely new ones. Remove Memories - You can completely remove memories of events. In either case, you have to have at least a basic idea of what you're looking for (when they saw me break into that house, watching their spouse die in front of them). The spell can get very precise in its ability to alter memories, allowing you to remove specific items or creatures, but otherwise maintain everything else. The cast time of the spell is equal to the amount of memory that you want to change. 2 minutes of fighting you want to erase? 2 minutes of concentration. For alterations that total longer than 5 minutes (including multiple strings of casts around the same time), the creature will fight to remember things that were altered or removed. When presented with contradictory evidence or otherwise prompted to think about these heavily modified memories, they get an additional save against the effect to restore their original memories. When you take damage or if the target moves out of reach, the spell ends.

entries.title: memory-movie
entries.content: Memory Movie Memory Movie \[mind-affecting] \[concentration] Larella 4 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRangeReachTarget1 creatureDuration10 minutesSaveWill Tap into a creature’s memories and display them on a small screen so nearby creatures can also see what you experience. Memories are viewed from the target’s perspective, so if they have impaired or inferior senses, so do you when you view the memory. You must decide what specific memory or type of memory to view (ie. first kiss, 20th birthday party). After you start viewing the memory in real time, you have the ability to skip ahead and rewind minutes at a time to better pinpoint important moments. When cast on yourself or a willing creature, the duration increases to 1 hour and you can freely change what memories you look at on a whim, allowing for improved curation. When you take damage or if the target moves more than 30 feet away from you, the spell ends.   Cannot view magically altered memories.

entries.content: Level 4

entries.title: glimpse-of-truth
entries.content: Glimpse of Truth Glimpse of Truth Larella 5 Cast Time - 1 swift action EffectTarget1 creatureDuration1 round You see everything as it truly is. \>You automatically disbelieve all illusions, such as figments, patterns and glamers\ \>You can see a polymorphed creatures true form\ \>You can see invisible creatures\ \>You gain darkvision

entries.content: Level 5

entries.title: telekinetic-thrust
entries.content: Telekinetic Thrust Telekinetic Thrust Larella 5 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange60 ftTargetVariesSaveSee text You can perform one of the following actions, manipulating matter with your mind. TossBriefly take hold of a creature's body (will negates) and throw them across the battlefield. You move them 30 ft and they take 5d8+CL (22+CL) crush damage.CrumpleBriefly take hold of a creature's body (will negates) and slam them against the ground. They are knocked down and take 5d8+CL (22+CL) crush damageArtilleryLift large objects or numerous small objects by breaking stone off of walls, shattering branches into needles etc.Toss these objects at your foes. Creatures within range in a 10 ft radius take 5d8+CL (22+CL) physical damage (reflex halves) based on the objects that you threw.ManeuverFunctions as telekinetic maneuver, but with a bonus of (5+CL). Cannot grapple.

entries.content: Level 6

entries.title: telekinesis
entries.content: Telekinesis Telekinesis \[buff] Larella 6 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange60 ftTargetVariesDuration1 minuteSaveSee text You exert your psychic power to such an extent that you are able to manipulate heavy objects and toss creatures around against their will. Your eyes glow and you emit a constant repulsive force pushing away loose objects nearby. For the duration of the spell, you gain a hover speed equal to your land speed. You can use this speed to fly during your turn. Immediately upon casting the spell, and every turn after as a standard action, you can perform one of the following actions. TossBriefly take hold of a creature's body (will negates) and throw them across the battlefield. You move them 30 ft and they take 5d8+CL (22+CL) crush damage.CrumpleBriefly take hold of a creature's body (will negates) and slam them against the ground. They are knocked down and take 5d8+CL (22+CL) crush damageArtilleryLift large objects or numerous small objects by breaking stone off of walls, shattering branches into needles etc.Toss these objects at your foes. Creatures within range in a 10 ft radius take 5d8+CL (22+CL) physical damage (reflex halves) based on the objects that you threw.ManeuverFunctions as telekinetic maneuver, but with a bonus of (6+CL).Repulsion [force]Unleash all of the spell's energy at once for one final blast. All creatures within 10 ft of you take 7d8+CL (31+CL) force damage and are pushed 60 feet away from you (fort halves damage and push distance). Repulsion immediately ends telekinesis.

entries.title: README
entries.content: Larella Colene Larella is an elven spell caster whose spells use psychic powers to gather information and out maneuver foes before the battles even begin. If it does come down to a fight, you can crush foes' minds or toss them around with telekinesis. Long distance communication is easy with spells like dream and sending. Creatures won't be able to keep secrets from you with access to spells like detect thoughts and memory movie.

entries.title: astrology
entries.content: Astrology Astrology Lunar 1 Cast Time - 10 minutes Material - 1 scroll or parchment EffectRangeReachTargetOne Creature {% hint style="info" %} In order to cast this spell, you must know the target's date of birth, and have access to the night sky. {% endhint %} When the spell is complete, you convert a scroll or parchment into a Horoscope. The target can read the Horoscope to gain insight into some of the strengths and failings they may have within the next 24 hours. As long as they have the horoscope on their person, they may add 2 to the natural die roll on any skill check. This cannot exceed the natural 20 limit of a d20. After they use this benefit, the horoscope disappears. A creature that cannot read cannot benefit from their Horoscope. A creature may only benefit from Astrology once per day.

entries.title: enchant-sapphire
entries.content: Enchant Sapphire Enchant Sapphire Lunar 1 Cast Time - 1 hour Material - A piece of Sapphire jewelry or a Sapphire, worth at least 500g EffectRangeReachTargetOne Sapphire, or sapphire jewelry You cast a spell on a Sapphire jewel or jewelry, turning it into a consumable magic item. The effects vary based on where the item goes on the body. RingYou create a Ring of Recoil, which reflects 1 true damage on every instance of damage to the creature that inflicted it, if any. Once it has reflected 20 damage, the ring disintegrates.NecklaceYou create a Necklace of Breathing, which automatically activates when you run out of breath, such as underwater or in outer space. As long as your airways are not obstructed, you can continue to breathe. After 20 minutes of cumulative use, the necklace disintegrates. The necklace is always used in 20 minute incrementsJewelYou create a Jewel of Preservation, which sends a distress signal to up to 5 total friends and family members of your choice when you are Defeated, Dead, or fear for your life. They receive a brief telepathic message in your voice that describes your location to the best of your knowledge, and to please send help. They cannot respond to this message, and after the message is sent, the jewel disintegrates.

entries.title: in-orbit
entries.content: In Orbit In Orbit \[force] \[buff] \[healing] Lunar 1 Cast Time - 1 swift action EffectRangeReachTargetSelfDuration3 rounds 3 small pale white orbs emerge from your staff and float around you. At the end of each of your turns, an orb bumps into to a creature within your natural reach. A single creature can only be hit by 1 orb a turn, but can be affected by multiple over several turns. When an orb bumps into a creature, it deals (3+CL) force damage and disappears. If multiple creatures are within your reach, multiple orbs bump. If more than 3 are within reach, choose 3 to affect. When all 3 orbs have bumped into a creature, gain (3+CL) temp hp. Only the orb part of the spell is a buff, not the temp hp.

entries.title: natural-geomancy
entries.content: Natural Geomancy Natural Geomancy Lunar 1 Cast Time - 10 minutes EffectRangeReachTargetOne plant or 10x10 area of terrainDuration48 hours For the duration of this spell, you get a mental ping whenever anything happens to the targeted plant or plot of terrain. You are informed what kind of interaction happened, such as whether it was trampled, touched, clipped, watered, etc. no matter how insignificant the interaction. You're also aware of the environmental conditions they are experiencing, such as approximate temperature, humidity, and even noise level. For animate plants, you gain a +2 bonus to nature checks to determine their health and needs, and can identify such mentally and remotely. This spell does not grant visual stimuli.

entries.title: providers-station
entries.content: Provider's Station Provider's Station Lunar 1 Cast Time - 10 minutes EffectRangeReachDurationUntil Rest {% hint style="info" %} In order to cast this spell, you must have access to the night sky. {% endhint %} When the spell is complete, you create an object or small facility that meets the bare minimum requirements for a particular task, trade, or skill, such as a furnace for heating pottery or a lockpick. This item will break if used for anything other than its intended purpose, and disappears after the spell's duration or if exposed to sunlight. You must create facilities that can fit within a 10ft cube. This spell does not provide fuel to run facilities. It may create objects with multiple parts, such as a series of vials and tubes for use in alchemy, but these cannot be separated from the facility without disappearing.

entries.title: README
entries.content: Level 1

entries.title: star-fall
entries.content: Star Fall Star Fall \[force] Lunar 1 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectAoE15 ft, centered on caster The skies darken above you and tiny motes of light pepper the heavens. You can call down stars on your foes. You automatically deal (CL) force damage to all enemies within 15 ft of you. Each time you hit an enemy with this spell, the damage increases by 3 for the next 2 rounds. Additional casts extend the duration of the increased damage, allowing it to ramp up in damage infinitely. Damage resets when you roll initiative.

entries.title: star-sight
entries.content: Star Sight Star Sight \[buff] Lunar 1 Cast Time - 1 swift action EffectTargetSelfDurationUntil Rest By spending a standard action to concentrate each round, you gain a completely unobstructed view of the sky as though it was a clear night. You ignore things like environmental conditions, being indoors and underground, light pollution etc. You get +2 bonus to astronomy or survival checks made to navigate.

entries.title: wandering-stars
entries.content: Wandering Stars Wandering Stars \[pattern] \[mind-affecting] Lunar 1 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange30 ftTarget1 enemyDuration1 roundSaveWill You unleash the beauty of the cosmos upon a creature as a group of stars swirl around them. They are fascinated for one round (will negates). When their fascination ends (including if they pass their save), you can spend an immediate action to make the stars move, provided you can see the target. You can direct the stars at another enemy within 30 ft. This can repeat indefinitely, but cannot effect the same creature more than once. If you do not spend an immediate action to redirect the spell, it ends.

entries.title: astral-infusion
entries.content: Astral Infusion Astral Infusion \[force] \[healing] \[upcast] Lunar 2 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange60 ftAoE10 ft radius, centered on a point on the groundSaveReflex A mote of energy resembling a shining star lands on this spot, dealing 2d8+CL (9+CL) force damage to all enemies (reflex halves). Some of the affected creatures' energy is absorbed and you may divert that energy to an ally within range. They gain restore hp equal to the (3\*number of creatures damaged by the spell).

entries.title: lunar-dream
entries.content: Lunar Dream Lunar Dream \[healing] Lunar 2 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectTargetSelfDuration30 minutes {% hint style="info" %} This spell must be cast in the presence of moonlight. {% endhint %} You fall asleep, your body lifted into the air on a cloud of stardust. Every minute, you regain 1 hp. After 30 minutes, you are restored to full health. You also gain a new save vs poisons and non-curse spell effects. You are otherwise asleep as normal, and anything that would normally wake you up still can, and ends the spell early, denying its full effect.

entries.title: nebula
entries.content: Nebula Nebula \[force] \[light] Lunar 2 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectAoE30 ft coneDuration3 rounds Conjure a cloud of stardust that illuminates in a 20 ft radius. It obscures vision beyond 5 feet, granting partial concealment. Anything beyond 5 feet grants total concealment. At the end of the spell's duration, it ignites dealing 3d8+CL (13+CL) force damage to all creatures in the area automatically.

entries.title: README
entries.content: Level 2

entries.title: unseen-blade
entries.content: Unseen Blade Unseen Blade \[glamer] \[buff] \[subtle] Lunar 2 Cast Time - 1 Swift Action EffectTargetSelfDuration1 minute While in the presence of moonlight, your held weapons become invisible, allowing you to feint a creature as a free action when you attack them with it once per turn, resolved before your attack.

entries.title: unseen-form
entries.content: Unseen Form Unseen Form \[glamer] \[buff] \[subtle] Lunar 2 Cast Time - 1 Swift Action EffectTargetSelfDuration1 minute While in the presence of moonlight, you become partially invisible, granting you total concealment from creatures beyond 30 feet and partial concealment from any creatures closer. Taking any actions besides simple interactions or movement reduces the effect to partial concealment.

entries.title: center-of-the-universe
entries.content: Center of the Universe Center of the Universe \[buff] \[force] Lunar 3 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectTargetSelfDuration3 rounds Many glowing orbs immediately move away from you and start rotating at a fixed distance of 15 ft. At the start and end of your turns, deal (CL) force damage to creatures that are exactly 15 ft away from you.

entries.title: cosmic-cage
entries.content: Cosmic Cage Cosmic Cage Lunar 3 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange30 ftAoE10 ft radius, centered on targetTarget1 creatureDuration3 roundsSaveFort You create a cage like structure at the edge of the radius of this spell. Creatures can still see in and out of the cage, and still have line of effect. The cage provides no cover. If a creature moves in or out of the cage, willingly or unwillingly, it is stunned for 1 round (fort reduces effect to dazed) and its movement is halted. A creature can only be affected by the spell once.

entries.title: dark-matter
entries.content: Dark Matter Dark Matter \[force] \[upcast] Lunar 3 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange60 ftAoE5 ft radius, centered on a point on the groundSaveReflex You mark a position on the ground and a dark shadow forms over it, indicating great danger to those nearby. At the start of your next turn, a chunk of condensed cosmic energy lands on this spot, dealing 4d12+CL (26+CL) force damage (reflex halves). If a creature's speed is zero (such as from being stunned or entangled) it has disadvantage on its save. Upcast - For each additional mana spent, increase damage by d12 (6).

entries.title: README
entries.content: Level 3

entries.title: the-stars-align
entries.content: The Stars Align The Stars Align \[recharge] Lunar 3 Cast Time - 1 Minute EffectTargetSelfDurationUntil Rest You can foresee the alignment of the heavens, but you do not know when it will occur. Next time you roll serendipity or a luck check of some kind, you add +4 to this check.

entries.title: vengeance
entries.content: Vengeance Vengeance \[buff] \[recharge] Lunar 3 Cast Time - 1 Immediate Action EffectTargetSelfDuration1 minute You may cast this spell in response to an attack or spell targeting you, but before its result is known. You may also cast it at any point on your turn. Remind your DM to announce attacks before making them to make casting this spell less awkward. You reflect 75% of the next instance of damage you take as true damage. This spell is particularly easy to identify due to its distinct visual effect of a skull appearing over your head, making the DC 10 points lower. This spell has a 1 minute cooldown.

entries.title: meteor-shower
entries.content: Meteor Shower Meteor Shower \[light] \[force] \[upcast] Lunar 4 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange60 ftAoEVariesDurationSee textSaveReflex Call down ray(s) of light from the heavens onto your foes. The spell’s CL increases by 2 at night with a direct view of the night sky. 40 ft around the area the spell impact becomes bright light for one minute. Shower - Target a 30 ft line in the spells area. Creatures in the area take 5d8+CL (22+CL) force damage (reflex halves). Strike - Target a single creature. The creature takes 5d10+CL (27+CL) force damage and is blinded for 1 round. (reflex halves and negates the blinded condition) Upcast - For each additional mana spent, increase shower damage by d8 (4), or strike by d10 (5).

entries.title: night-comet
entries.content: Night Comet Night Comet \[force] \[light] \[upcast] Lunar 4 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange30 ftTarget1 creature Make a ranged attack roll as you fire a large dart of magic. The target takes 5d10+CL (27+CL) force damage. While in the presence of moonlight, this dart is invisible, making it DD against creatures that cannot see it. Upcast - For each additional mana spent, increase damage by d10 (5).

entries.title: README
entries.content: Level 4

entries.title: sacrificial-heal
entries.content: Sacrificial Heal Sacrificial Heal \[healing] Lunar 4 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRangeReachTarget1 creature Sacrifice any amount of your hp and transfer it to another creature. Also transfers this spell's mana cost to the target. If you choose to \[mana burn], you can even heal mana burn from the creature an equal amount.

entries.title: README
entries.content: Level 5

entries.title: singularity
entries.content: Singularity Singularity \[force] \[persistent] \[concentration] Lunar 5 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange10 ft, centered on a point on the groundAoE300 ftDuration3 roundsSaveFort Choose a point in space to manifest a dark sphere with a selective gravitational pull. Immediately upon casting, and as a swift action each subsequent turn, 3 creatures (or objects weighing less than a ton) of your choosing within 100 feet of the singularity are pulled 30 feet closer (fort reduces to 10ft). Any creature in an adjacent space is considered touching it, dealing 2d6+CL (7+CL) force damage.

entries.title: lunar-eclipse
entries.content: Lunar Eclipse Lunar Eclipse \[darkness] \[concentration] \[recharge] Lunar 6 Cast Time - 1 Minute EffectAoE5 mile radius, centered on casterDuration5 minutes You alter the composition of the heavens in such a way to mimic the effect of a lunar eclipse. The radius of the spell is coated in darkness. All non-magical light sources are immediately extinguished and cease to function while in the spells area. Magical light sources that existed in the area previously, that are cast in the radius or are brought into its radius after the fact must succeed on a caster level check (DC 11+CL) or they fizzle. Lunar eclipse ends automatically if solar eclipse is cast in its range, cancelling each other out. All weather inducing spells do not function underground.

entries.title: moonblast
entries.content: Moonblast Moonblast \[force] \[recharge] Lunar 6 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange60 ftDuration1 round, see text You gently float into the air and the cradle yourself with energy that takes the shape of a full moon. You enter stasis until the start of your next turn. As a free action at the start of your next turn, launch the moon at an enemy within range. Roll a ranged attack to deal 7d6+CL (24+CL) force damage. The creature also gains weakness 10 to force damage for 1 minute.

entries.title: README
entries.content: Level 6

entries.title: the-skies-descend
entries.content: The Skies Descend The Skies Descend \[force] \[recharge] Lunar 6 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange60 ftAoE20 ft, centered on a point on the ground100 ft, centered on a point on the groundSaveReflex You mark a position on the ground and a dark shadow forms over a 20 ft radius, and an bright and shining object hurtling towards it is visible from the sky. At the start of your next turn, a small star lands on this spot, dealing 7d10+CL (33+CL) force damage and stuns for 1 round (reflex halves dmg and turns stun into stagger). The star then sends a shockwave out to affect all enemies within a 100ft radius. They are automatically treated as though they pass their save.

entries.title: README
entries.content: Lunar Surrounding the magic of the moon are many Lunar Realms, ruled over by a single Lunar Kingdom. The magic of the realms themselves bestowed the royalty of the ruling class, with the Queen and King at the top being given unique wisdom and strength with which to lead their people. The secrets to their magic were closely guarded by the royal family until the last King was murdered in a foreign adversary's coup attempt, and the princess at the time mysteriously disappeared for months. When she returned to take the throne back, she made the secrets of the Moon Queen's Wisdom public knowledge, but the secrets to the Moon King's Strength was forever lost when the Moon Princess died without providing the Lunar Realms a new heir. These spells are based upon the Moon Queen's Wisdom. They focus on abilities passed down from the stars themselves that grant foresight, prosperity, retribution, and access to the ebb and flow of magic from heavenly bodies. Many lunar spells deal force damage and have delayed benefits. Some Lunar spells require access to the night sky.

entries.title: dark-lure
entries.content: Dark Lure Dark Lure \[subtle] Moogen 1 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange30 ftDuration1 roundSaveWill A nearly invisible whip of shadows emerges from your staff and wraps around a target. The target is pulled towards you in a subtle way that makes it feel like it is of their own volition. On their next turn, they spend all of their movement to move closer to you and cannot move away.

entries.title: imagination
entries.content: Imagination Imagination \[figment] Moogen 1 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange60 ftDurationConcentration+1 minuteSaveWill You create an illusory object or creature that to all senses appears real. The size of what you create is limited to a 5x5x5 ft cube, but other than that, there are few limitations. You can create a fire, and it (seems to) gives off heat. You can create a dog and it bounces around in its space and barks. You can create a door that creaks as it swings on its broken hinges. When you initially cast the spell, you decide a type of behavior that your imaginary creation exhibits. Maybe you want your person that you made to dance, but then the party you're at the music stops. You can spend a standard action concentrating on the spell (as long as you have line of sight to your imagination) to have it change behaviors to instead bow before a king. You cannot change what you imagine, but you can change what your imagination does. Your imagination isn't limited to the laws of physics, so you can have it do incredibly unusual things, like having a person swim through air or a rock doing flips. However, when creatures see unusual stimuli like that, they get a save to disbelieve it. If someone points out it’s a fake, other creatures automatically see through it and it appears translucent to them. When used in combat, creatures may waste their time attacking the imaginary creature, but instead of rolling attacks or the imagination rolling saves, the attacking creature rolls a save. Failed saves indicate they miss or the creature resists the attack. Passed saves indicate they see through the ruse, and they can communicate this to their allies, making them automatically disbelieve it, causing the illusion appear translucent to all. The "concentration" part of the duration allows you to indefinitely maintain this imagination as long as you concentrate each turn as a standard action. You must have line of sight to the imagination to concentrate on it. If you do not concentrate on the spell for 1 minute, it disappears. Upcast - Each additional mana you spend increases the dimensions by 5 ft on all sides, to a max of 4 mana and 20x20x20 dimensions. By spending 5 mana, the duration also changes to permanent, no longer requiring concentration. Dispel magic automatically succeeds against permanent imaginations.

entries.title: living-shadow
entries.content: Living Shadow Living Shadow \[figment] \[concentration] \[teleportation] Moogen 1 Cast Time - 1 Swift Action EffectRange0 ftDuration1 minute Your shadow detaches and forms a copy of you in your current space. It looks like you, but made of a shadowy mist with your eyes. It is stationary and mimics your attacks/gestures. You can use this shadow as the origin point for your spells and attacks. It can also make AoOs. You still must be able to see the target of your attacks/spells. As a swift action, you can teleport to this shadow if it is within 30 ft of you, ending the spell.

entries.title: night-crawler
entries.content: Night Crawler Night Crawler \[buff] Moogen 1 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRangeReachTarget1 creatureDurationUntil Rest You gain night vision.  While in an area of dim light or darkness, you turn into a dark silhouette version of yourself, with only your eyes remaining the same. If you are exposed to bright light, your form slowly returns back to normal over 3 rounds (\~20 seconds). Returning back to darkness turns you back into a silhouette. You can toggle this shadow form off/on if you want yourself to be seen. While a silhouette, you get a +2 bonus on disguise and stealth.

entries.title: README
entries.content: Level 1

entries.title: vanish
entries.content: Vanish Vanish \[glamer] Moogen 1 Cast Time - 1 Swift Action EffectTargetSelf Functions as invisibility (Moogen 6) but only lasts until the end of turn.

entries.title: ventriloquism
entries.content: Ventriloquism Ventriloquism \[buff] Moogen 1 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectTargetSelfDuration10 minutes You can cause your voice to sound as though it is originating from a location you can see within 30 ft of you whenever you speak.

entries.title: wave-of-darkness
entries.content: Wave of Darkness Wave of Darkness \[darkness] \[concentration] Moogen 1 Cast Time - 1 Swift Action EffectAoE30 ft line, originating from casterDuration1 minuteSaveFort You slash at the air with your staff and a dark cloud washes over the area in front of you. The area is total darkness while the spell persists. You can increase the cast time of this ability to a standard action to have it deal 2d6+CL (7+CL) cold dmg when you initially create it (fort halves). This also gives the spell the \[cold] tag.

entries.title: alone
entries.content: Alone Alone \[mind-affecting] Moogen 2 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange30 ftTarget1 creatureDuration3 roundsSaveWill You cause the target creature to be alone. All of the creatures allies and neutral parties disappear to all the senses for the target. They are unable to interact with allies directly or target them with specific effects. They can't use anything that requires teamwork like flanking, casting buffs, teamwork feats etc. They might be able to infer the position of their allies based off of how their enemies are acting. When a creature that possesses companions is targeted by this spell, they are unable to effectively coordinate with them. Their companions temporarily lose the teamwork feats and their commander's charisma bonus to attack while this spell persists. This also applies to individual companions targeted by this spell.

entries.title: darkness
entries.content: Darkness Darkness \[darkness] Moogen 2 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRangeReachAoE20 ft radius, centered on a point on the groundDuration1 minute A cloud of black mist emerges from your fingertips. This mist absorbs all natural light and leaves the area where it covers in complete darkness. You can use the spell effectively as dispel magic against a spell with the \[light] tag. If you succeed, the darkness spell consumes the light and takes hold.

entries.title: hellscape
entries.content: Hellscape Hellscape \[curse] \[mind-affecting] \[glamer] Moogen 2 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange30 ftTarget1 creatureSaveWill You alter a target's perception, causing it to perceive the world around it as though it were made entirely out of flesh, blood and viscera (will negates). It is shaken 2. If it interacts with the environment, such as opening a door or climbing a tree, the shaken penalty increases by 1. To remove the curse you must hug a child.

entries.title: nearsighted
entries.content: Nearsighted Nearsighted \[darkness] Moogen 2 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange30 ftTarget1 creatureDuration3 roundsSaveWill You cause a shadowy mist to cover a creatures eyes and reduce their vision range to 15 ft (will negates). All attacks made against the creature from beyond this range are made as though the target was DD. Upcast - For each additional mana spent, target an additional creature.

entries.title: README
entries.content: Level 2

entries.title: shadow-puppets
entries.content: Shadow Puppets Shadow Puppets \[subtle] \[concentration] Moogen 2 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange30 ftTarget1 creatureSaveWill By holding your hands in the air and making some silly hand gestures, you can create sinister shadows along the ground and walls. As long as you concentrate, you can continue to make these innocuous shadow puppets for entertainment and such.  Any creature proficient in arcana immediately gets a check to identify the spell (DC 17) if they can see the puppet show. At any point (including immediately when you cast the spell) you can cause the shadows to come to life and take a bite or otherwise attack a creature. Even if you play with the shadows a bit and delay the attack, it still requires a standard action. The creature takes 3d8+CL (13+CL) slash or pierce damage and is frightened for one round (will halves damage and negates frightened). If a creature successfully identifies the spell during a show and either they are the target or they warn the creature that is, they get advantage on their saving throw. If the creature is unaware of the danger the shadow puppets hold and they are the target of the spell later, they have disadvantage on their saving throw. Both of these situations can only happen if the caster chooses to delay the negative effects of the spell. {% hint style="info" %} Tl;dr - You can cast the spell as a standard to play with shadows or attack. If you decided to play with the shadows for a bit, you must still spend a standard action to use the attack. Playing with the shadows can just be for flavor, or it can be a risky method to enhance its power against those not trained in arcana. {% endhint %}

entries.title: shadow-weapon
entries.content: Shadow Weapon Shadow Weapon \[frost] Moogen 2 Cast Time - 1 Swift Action EffectDuration10 minutes You transform a held weapon such that it appears to be made out of complete darkness, absorbing the light around it. You can also choose to transform your staff into another weapon to dual wield, making you unable to cast further spells. You can transform it back as a free action. If the weapon leaves your hands for longer than 3 rounds, it reverts back to its original state. Shadow weapons deal frost damage instead of their standard damage type. When you feint a creature while wielding them, it takes (CL) frost damage.

entries.title: silence
entries.content: Silence Silence \[dismissable] \[concentration] Moogen 2 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange60 ftAoE20 ft radius, centered on a pointTargetSelf, or an objectDuration1 minute Sound cannot be created in or enter the area of this spell. Creatures are unable to speak, cry for help etc. Certain abilities dependent on sound like bardic performance, spell casting and abilities that deal sonic damage are all completely disabled. If you cast the spell on yourself, then it stays anchored to you, but it changes to a 10-foot radius and gains the \[buff] tag.

entries.title: afterimage
entries.content: Afterimage Afterimage \[glamer] \[figment] Moogen 3 Cast Time - 1 Swift Action EffectTargetSelfSaveWill Functions as invisibility (Moogen 6) but only lasts until the end of turn. In addition, you leave behind an illusory copy of yourself in your current position that repeats a simple type of movement you perform right before vanishing. This can be something like shadowboxing or crouching while looking around. This figment lasts for 1 round before disappearing. If a creature sees you use this technique, they know something is up. If they don’t see you use it, they treat it as the real you (will negates). A creature can identify your afterimages if they have seen one on another occasion.

entries.title: encroaching-darkness
entries.content: Encroaching Darkness Encroaching Darkness \[darkness] \[concentration] Moogen 3 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRangeReachAoE20 ft radius, centered on a point on the ground: see textDuration1 minute A cloud of black mist emerges from your fingertips. This mist absorbs all natural light and leaves the area where it covers in complete darkness. At the end of each of your turns, the darkness spreads an additional 10 ft. You can use the spell effectively as dispel magic against a spell with the \[light] tag. If you succeed, the darkness spell consumes the light and takes hold.

entries.title: eyes-everywhere
entries.content: Eyes Everywhere Eyes Everywhere \[subtle] \[scrying] Moogen 3 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRangeReach You pluck one of your eyes from your head and seal the empty eyelid. After, you place the plucked eye onto a surface. It melds into that surface and closes. By placing your hand over your other eye(s), you can open the plucked eye and gaze/hear through it instead of where your body is. By forcefully opening the sealed eye, you end this spell. If a creature pokes the eye, whether its open or closed, the spell ends. Otherwise, it lasts indefinitely. They eye appears as Moogen's eye instead of yours. Whenever the eye is open, creatures present can roll perception to notice it each day. The DC is either your spell DC, or 15+(your stealth bonus).

entries.title: gutwrench
entries.content: Gutwrench Gutwrench \[mind-affecting] Moogen 3 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange30 ftTarget1 creatureSaveWill Inflict a creature with a staggering pain in their stomach. When they look down, they see a blade inflicting a horrible wound upon them, either emerging from their stomach, or grazing their waist. What they see is what they believe, and what they believe manifests into reality. The creature takes 4d8+CL (18+CL) pierce damage and causes them to bleed d6 damage for 2 rounds (will halves damage and negates bleed). While a creature is bleeding from this spell, they are also effectively silenced as they cough up blood.

entries.title: illusory-wall
entries.content: Illusory Wall Illusory Wall \[figment] Moogen 3 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRangeReach You create a wall, floor or ceiling of any type that can appear to be made of anything. It blends seamlessly with the nearby terrain to appear as natural as possible. The wall can be no larger than 10x10 feet. You cannot chain cast invisible walls to make a bigger wall.  If the wall would take any damage then it immediately disappears. If a creature attempts to move through the wall or otherwise interact with it meaningfully, then it disappears.

entries.title: README
entries.content: Level 3

entries.title: death-mark
entries.content: Death Mark Death Mark \[curse] Moogen 4 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange60 ftTargetOne creatureSaveWill A red mark appears along the creatures neck(s) resembling a bloody wound (will negates). They gain weakness 2. As an immediate action over any distance, you can "pop" the mark, removing the curse and dealing 5d6+CL (17+CL) true damage. This curse is removed by killing another creature.

entries.title: nightmare
entries.content: Nightmare Nightmare \[fear] Moogen 4 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRangeUnlimitedTargetOne sleeping creatureSaveWill When you cast this spell, you fall into a catatonic state until your target falls asleep. You can choose to leave this state if you feel they are taking too long. When it falls asleep, it's dreams are plagued by horrific imagery of your choosing. When the creature wakes up from this dream, it is drained 1 (will negates). This spell has no mechanical effect against a creature that is already drained, but you can still haunt their dreams if you want. If you know the creature well enough to know about some deep-seated fear that they have, the creature has disadvantage on their saving throw.

entries.title: piercing-gaze
entries.content: Piercing Gaze Piercing Gaze \[curse] \[scrying] Moogen 4 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectAoE10 ft radius, centered on a point on the groundRange60 ftSaveReflex Close one of your eyes and cause a much larger illusory copy of it to open on the ground. It swells before bursting in a cloud of sharp fragments, dealing 5d6+CL (17+CL) pierce damage and applying a curse (reflex halves dmg and negates curse). While a creature is cursed with your piercing gaze, a tattoo of your eye appears on their back. You see their aura as a glowing outline around their person, even through total cover. You get a +8 bonus to perception and survival checks to track them. At any point in the future, you can close it again (standard action) in the future to open an obvious illusory copy of your eye above a creature cursed with your piercing gaze. You can watch them through this eye indefinitely. If they attempt to move or cover the eye, it evades barriers attacks etc in order to keep line of sight on the cursed creature. This curse is removed by spending an hour to write your own eulogy, then burying it that night.

entries.title: README
entries.content: Level 4

entries.title: umbral-trespass
entries.content: Umbral Trespass Umbral Trespass \[elusive] \[recharge] Moogen 4 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRangeReachTarget1 creatureDuration1 roundSaveFort Fade away into shadowy mist and flow into the target of the spell. You disappear and enter stasis while you observe the world from the creature's PoV. On your next turn, you must spend another standard action to leave the creature's body in a violent slash, dealing 5d8+CL (22+CL) slash or pierce damage (fort halves) and dashing 15 ft away from the creature. This spell cannot be cast again for 1 minute.

entries.title: darkvault
entries.content: Darkvault Darkvault \[teleportation] Moogen 5 Cast Time - 1 Swift Action EffectRange60 ftTargetSelf {% hint style="warning" %} This spell can only be cast while hiding. {% endhint %} Teleport to a location of dim light or darkness.

entries.title: mirage
entries.content: Mirage Mirage \[figment] Moogen 5 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectAoE1 mile radius, centered on casterSaveWill You affect a wide area to completely change its appearance into something else. You can create an oasis in a desert, a house on a hill or make your house look like a flat piece of land. Creatures typically don't get a save to disbelieve the illusion unless something tips them off: bumping into a wall that shouldn't be there or drinking from a pool of water that holds only sand. The less suspicious and out of place the mirage is, the less likely creatures get a will save to see through it. Casting mirage a second time removes the previous one.

entries.title: README
entries.content: Level 5

entries.title: shadow-projection
entries.content: Shadow Projection Shadow Projection \[figment] \[upcast] \[dismissable] \[scrying] Moogen 5 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange300 ftDuration1 hour You create an illusory duplicate that is shaped like you but it's almost entirely black, save for its eyes. You project this shadow to a location within the spells range that you can see. While occupying this shadow, you can speak and move around freely in this new illusory body. You can cast spells, but you cannot physically interact with objects otherwise. If the shadow is ever exposed to bright light, then it disappears. If it ever takes damage, then you also take the damage and it disappears. It uses all of your statistics to determine its defenses. Upcast 6 - You no longer need to be able to see the position you initially project your shadow to, though you have to at least seen the place before. The spells range changes to unlimited.

entries.title: invisibility
entries.content: Invisibility Invisibility \[glamer] \[buff] Moogen 6 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectTargetSelfSelfUntil rest You appear to vanish from thin air. You gain total concealment, automatically take the hide action and get a +4 bonus on stealth checks while invisible. Objects that you carry turn invisible. This spell ends when you attack or otherwise take some form of aggressive action, like casting a spell or using an item on a creature. Certain environmental conditions can aid in seeing where this creature is. The presence of water or snow can give a better idea of their position. Inflicting a bleed effect can give you a trail of where they have been. Air that is dense from some kind of particle like dust, or actively throwing something like a bag of flour at the creature can also give you an idea of the creature's position. Regardless of whether or not you know what space the creature is, they still maintain their total concealment.

entries.title: README
entries.content: Level 6

entries.title: README
entries.content: 👁️ Moogen Moogen isn’t so much a creature as she is an idea. She is handily replaced by anyone who can outwit her, kill her, then take her place. She is a demon that exists in the shadows, content to play with the affairs of others (usually mortals). She regularly invites mortals into her loving arms as pawns in some kind of scheme, always ready with a knife to their back if they don’t play along. Moogen spells assist in manipulating light sources, stealth and misdirection.

entries.title: bush
entries.content: Bush Bush Mother Earth 1 Cast Time - 1 Swift Action EffectRange30 ftTarget1 unoccupied spaceDuration1 minute You cause a bunch of tall grass to spring up. This space is overgrown and is considered difficult terrain. It also provides cover to any attacks made into or through it. You can take the hide action in this bush as a free action the turn you cast this spell. The bush withers and fades after 1 minute, or 3 rounds if the environment couldn't otherwise sustain it.

entries.title: hibernate
entries.content: Hibernate Hibernate Mother Earth 1 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRangeReachTarget1 willing or defeated creatureDuration24 hours You cause a creature to enter a catatonic state akin to a deep sleep. Nothing short of taking damage can awaken the creature from its slumber. The creature gains the benefit of resting and is staggered for 1 minute after waking up if it slept the full duration.

entries.title: pet
entries.content: Pet Pet \[mind-affecting] Mother Earth 1 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRangeReachTarget1 beast(ish) creatureDurationVariesSaveWill You reach over to a creature and pat its head. If it resembles an animal, even superficially, it is dazed on hit for 1 turn. If it is a defeated creature that matches this description, it gets the time out condition for 1 hour. Tamed animals (such as beast companions) can be brought back from pet heaven with a counter pet as a swift action.

entries.title: pollinate
entries.content: Pollinate Pollinate \[poison] \[upcast] Mother Earth 1 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange30 ftTarget1 creatureSaveFort Shower a foe with a thick cloud of toxic plant dust. Creature takes d6+CL (3+CL) poison damage. The powder also has an additional effect (fort negates). Choose One:\ Poison Powder - Creature takes an additional (3+CL) poison damage at the end of its turns (fort ends effect).\ Rage Powder - Creature is taunted by you for one round. Upcast 3 The spell instead deals 2d6+CL (7+CL) poison damage. You gain new options. Choose One:\ Sleep Powder - Creature is put to sleep.\ Stun Spore - Creature is dazed for 1 turn.\ Deadly Poison Powder - Creature takes an additional 2d6+CL (7+CL) poison damage at the end of its turns (fort ends effect).

entries.title: README
entries.content: Level 1

entries.title: speak-with-animals
entries.content: Speak with Animals Speak with Animals Mother Earth 1 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectTargetSelfDurationUntil Rest You can speak with beasts and magical beasts as though you share a common language. They are able to much better articulate their feelings as though they possessed the intellect of a simple humanoid, but their instincts, desires and attitude toward you remain largely the same.

entries.title: tree-shape
entries.content: Tree Shape Tree Shape \[polymorph, true] Mother Earth 1 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectTargetSelfDurationUntil Rest Transform into a young living tree, a large shrub or dead tree. The type of tree, as well as its appearance, is under your control. While in tree form, you can observe the world around you just as if you were in your normal form. You can dismiss tree shape as a free action. You get a +10 bonus to stealth/disguise while in tree form and can use either skill to evade detection, otherwise people will think something is fishy about this tree. You cannot move or take any actions while in tree form, but you can speak.

entries.title: vine-whip
entries.content: Vine Whip Vine Whip \[buff] Mother Earth 1 Cast Time - 1 Swift Action EffectTargetSelfDurationUntil Rest Two long and supple green vines grow from your body. You can use these vines to hold and manipulate objects within 15 ft, but not wield equipment, such as weapons, shields or staves. These function as whips, but they are considered natural attacks and deal d6 crush damage.

entries.title: wild-growth
entries.content: Wild Growth Wild Growth Mother Earth 1 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange60 ftAoE20 ft radius, centered on a point on the ground Enemies within the spell's area have plants suddenly grow in the chinks of their armor and around their feet, tangling their joints. They have their speed reduced by 15. The plants can be destroyed by dealing slashing or fire damage to them, or 10 damage of any other type.

entries.title: ants-in-your-pants
entries.content: Ants in your Pants Ants in your Pants Mother Earth 2 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange30 ftTarget1 creatureDuration3 roundsSaveReflex You launch a stream of ants that get your opponent MOVING (reflex reduces effect to 1 round). They take a (3+CL) pierce damage at the start of their turn. They must start each of their turns by moving 10 ft in a random direction. Being immersed or drenched in water, taking any AoE damage or something else suitable can reduce the duration of this spell or remove the ants completely. The ants automatically disperse if the foe is defeated.

entries.title: arboreal-army
entries.content: Arboreal Army Arboreal Army \[concentration] Mother Earth 2 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectAoE20 ft radius, centered on a point on the groundDuration1 minute All the nearby plants snap to attention, ready to receive orders. As a swift action each turn, you can command a nearby inanimate plant to bully a nearby creature by bending its trunk or swinging its branches. Its bonus is your CL. It gets advantage if the creature is currently inside of the attacking tree, bush etc.

entries.title: fairy-dust
entries.content: Fairy Dust Fairy Dust Mother Earth 2 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange30 ftAoE5ft radius, centered on a point in the airDurationVariesSaveSee text You borrow some fairy dust from the fey wilds and toss it at your enemy, with a variety of effects. Choose One:\ Sparkles - Coat creatures in brilliant sparkly particles. Attacks made against a creature covered in sparkles have seeking. Sparkly creatures have a -10 stealth penalty.\ Flashy - The dust sparkles so brightly that it blinds creatures for 1 minute (reflex reduces to blurred vision). At the end of a creature's turn, they can make an additional save to reduce the condition.\ Blind>blurred vision>normal.\ Rainbow \[pattern] \[mind-affecting] - Targets are fascinated for 1 minute (will negates).

entries.title: fetch
entries.content: Fetch Fetch \[mind-affecting] Mother Earth 2 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action Focus - 1 Stick, Ball or Similar Object EffectRange30 ftTarget1 creatureDurationUntil item is retrievedSaveWill You wiggle an object at a creature in range and toss it to a space within 30 feet of you. The creature must spend all of its actions to retrieve this object and bring it back to you (will negates). If you ever get more than 30 feet away from the object, you are no longer visible to the target or the creature successfully brings it back to you, the spell ends. If there is something that impedes the creature's movement, it can reasonably spend its actions dealing with this obstacle (a wall of sheep, creature is grappled etc).  If the creature does not retrieve the item after the first turn, then it gets an additional save at the end of each of its turn to shake off the compulsion to fetch. This spell’s DC is 2 higher when targeting beasts.

entries.title: nourish
entries.content: Nourish Nourish Mother Earth 2 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRangeDetails Vary You infuse plants with life, with a variety of effects.   Choose one:\ Cultivate \[recharge] - You cause a single dying plant to become vibrant, putting it on the correct path for future growth. If you \[mana burn], you can even accelerate its growth one stage. Seed>sprout>seedling>sapling>adult. Fertilize \[recharge] - Tracts of land become more habitable for plants, enriching soil and removing contaminants, assuring future growth. You target 1 square mile. Contaminators might not be too happy… Constrict - An enemy within 30 ft must roll a reflex save or be entangled. They can make an athletics check to escape (standard, spell DC).

entries.title: power-of-the-sun
entries.content: Power of the Sun Power of the Sun \[psychic] \[fear] \[dismissable] Mother Earth 2 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange30 ftTarget1 creatureDuration1 hourSaveWill You temporarily instill great fear of the sun to a creature. Every turn the creature starts its turn in an area lit with sunlight or moves into a sun-lit area, it takes 2d6 (7) psychic damage and is shaken 1.

entries.title: queen-bee
entries.content: Queen Bee Queen Bee \[buff] Mother Earth 2 Cast Time - 1 Swift Action EffectTargetSelfDuration1 minute You summon a swarm of bees that intuitively follow your orders without need for speech. The bees won’t enter water. You must maintain a tether to them using the swarm almost like an additional limb that if separated, immediately disappears.  You take a -5 penalty to stealth checks and you have a hover speed of 30. The bees hover around you and can perform a few sets of tasks...\ Interact (action varies) - The bees can perform tasks with a high degree of precision such as picking up objects and opening doors. They can perform any task you could perform with your hands (including skills like SoH) at a range of 20 feet  Sting \[envenom] (standard) - Automatically deal (2+CL) pierce damage to a single creature within 10 feet. They are also staggered for 1 round (fort negates). Protect (immediate) - The bees move to block an attack, giving you a +4 bonus to ac or +4 bonus to a reflex save. This subtracts 5 rounds from the duration of the spell

entries.title: README
entries.content: Level 2

entries.title: wall-of-sheep
entries.content: Wall of Sheep Wall of Sheep \[concentration] Mother Earth 2 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectAoEA wall 20 ft high and 20 ft wideDuration1 minute You summon a flock of sheep that quickly pile up on top of each other to form a fluffy impassable barrier. The sheep are completely impervious to all forms of attack unless it is a combat maneuver. The wall has 20 poise. When poise broken, a 5x5 section of the wall falls apart and the sheep disappear. If the creature who broke through the wall was larger, the hole is also large enough for them to fit (10x10 large, 15x15 huge etc). In order to interact with the wall, it required maneuvering through the unruly sheep. To climb on the wall, it requires an athletics roll, to balance on it requires acrobatics etc (skill DC=caster's DC).

entries.title: floristry
entries.content: Floristry Floristry \[companion] Mother Earth 3 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange30 ftDuration1 minute You cause a vibrant thorny flower to sprout from the ground. It mindlessly shoots your enemies for the spells duration, focusing a target you choose when you cast, or the nearest creature if the first target leaves the flowers range. It loses 5 hp each turn. When it is defeated, it wilts and crumbles to dust. If the flower is summoned in an area that otherwise wouldn’t sustain it, such as underground or in stone, it loses 10 hp each turn.

entries.title: forests-curse
entries.content: Forest's Curse Forest's Curse \[curse] Mother Earth 3 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange30 ftTarget1 creatureSaveWill You curse a foe to wander aimlessly and suffer while in forested terrain. They take a -10 penalty to survival checks made to navigate in forest/jungle type terrain. They also lose poison resistance if they have it. In order to remove this curse, the creature must plant 3 new trees.

entries.title: mad-monkeys
entries.content: Mad Monkeys Mad Monkeys \[companion] \[sonic] Mother Earth 3 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange30 ftDuration1 minute You channel your inner tree to summon one to your aid. Gain (3\*CL) temp hp when you cast this spell. Summon a treant that understands druidic and does its best to aid you. When you lose this temp hp, the treant disappears.

entries.title: oaken-summons
entries.content: Oaken Summons Oaken Summons \[companion] \[healing] Mother Earth 3 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange30 ftDuration1 minute You grow bark on the exterior of your skin and to summon a treant to your aid. Gain (3\*CL) temp hp when you cast this spell. The treant that understands druidic and does its best to aid you. When you lose this temp hp, the treant disappears.

entries.title: persistent-pranksters
entries.content: Persistent Pranksters Persistent Pranksters \[concentration] Mother Earth 3 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange30 ftDuration1 minute You summon a group of playful fairies that fly around the battlefield and bother your enemies. They do not have any hp, but they do have 25+CL poise. If they are ever poise broken, they disappear. On your turn they can fly up to 30 feet and make a combat maneuver against a creature. The result of the combat maneuver is always 20+CL. You can direct them to focus on specific creatures.

entries.title: sunny-day
entries.content: Sunny Day Sunny Day \[recharge] Mother Earth 3 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectAoE1 mile burst, centered on casterDuration1 hour The clouds part and the sun shines brightly. All plant creatures in the area gain +2 attack and FH 1. You cannot cast this spell at night. All weather inducing spells do not function underground.

entries.title: leech-seed
entries.content: Leech Seed Leech Seed \[healing] \[necrotic] \[concentration] Mother Earth 4 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange30 ftTarget1 CreatureDuration1 minuteSaveReflex Shower a foe with seeds that take root inside of their skin (reflex negates). At the end of your turn, they take (CL+5) necrotic damage and you recover hp equal to the damage if you are within 30 ft. As an immediate action, you can divert the flow of energy to bestow this healing upon another creature within 30 ft of you. If neither you nor an ally is within 30 ft of the seeded creature, the damage does not occur.

entries.title: solar-power
entries.content: Solar Power Solar Power \[fire] \[recharge] Mother Earth 4 Cast Time - 1 Swift Action EffectDetails Vary {% hint style="info" %} Special: This spell can only be cast during the day with access to the open sky. {% endhint %} During the initial turn you cast this spell, you accumulate energy from the sun. On the following turn, choose one to do as a standard action… Solar Blade - Make a melee attack with a +2 bonus. It does 5d8+CL (22+CL) fire damage. Solar Beam - Target a 60 ft line that is 15 ft wide with 5d6+CL (17+CL) fire damage (reflex halves). The DC is 2 higher. Rather than damage plants, it invigorates them, curing fatigue. If you are unable to take actions on the following turn, you lose the charge. This spell cannot be cast in any turn you fire a solar beam or attack with a solar blade.

entries.title: string-shot
entries.content: String Shot String Shot Mother Earth 4 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange30 ftSaveFort Shoot a precise string of webbing at a creature. They are entangled and you may slam them against the ground into any position within the spells range to deal 5d6+CL (17+CL) crush damage (fort negates damage). Athletics as a standard action to remove entangled.

entries.title: voice-of-the-forest
entries.content: Voice of the Forest Voice of the Forest \[upcast] Mother Earth 4 Cast Time - 10 Minutes EffectAoE10 mile radius {% hint style="info" %} This spell can only be cast in a densely forested area (such as a rainforest or woodland). {% endhint %} You enter a trance while you slowly become one with nature over the cast time. Once you have completed the cast time, your spirit separates from your body and it is free to wander and explore. While wandering your body is effectively stunned. If you take damage or are hit with a harmful effect, the trance ends. There is no limit on on how long you can remain in this trance, but staying in for many hours leaves your body hungry and tired. While in spirit form you have a sixth sense for detecting water sources and when the forest is being significantly damaged within the spells area. Someone cutting down a tree isn't enough to trigger this, but a large scale lumber organization cutting away is. When you detect one of these things, you can appear overhead to observe. Other creatures cannot see you unless they can also see invisible creatures or ghosts. At any point, you can decide to speak. You can make your voice soft or loud and you make it seem to emanate all around the area, giving you advantage on intimidation. You can also cause any of the nearby creatures to exhibit any behavior natural to them, such as being completely silent, making noise or perching overhead. They won't engage dangerous situations at your request. Upcast 6 - The AoE of the spell increases to 100 miles.

entries.content: Level 5

entries.title: rebirth
entries.content: Rebirth Rebirth Mother Earth 5 Cast Time - 1 Minute Material - 5k of rare herbs and spices EffectRangeReachTarget1 willing creature This spell can be used by creatures hoping to change themselves. After the cast time completes, the creature falls unconscious to dream about its new self as a cocoon forms around them. 24 hours pass and they awaken in their new form. The creature can change its race, its gender and its physical appearance to its liking. The creature has complete control over all features such as racial traits, height, age, skin color etc as long as it falls within reasonable parameters for the race. If the cocoon is destroyed, the spell fails and the creature inside is killed..

entries.title: savage-roar
entries.content: Savage Roar Savage Roar \[mind-affecting] Mother Earth 5 Cast Time - 1 Standard action EffectAoE30 ft radius, centered on casterTargetAll allies Let out a powerful roar to inspire savagery and anger in your allies. All allied creatures make a melee attack against a creature within reach. Beasts and any creature that can understand druidic get a +4 bonus to this attack.

entries.title: solar-eclipse
entries.content: Solar Eclipse Savage Roar \[light] \[concentration] \[recharge] Mother Earth 6 Cast Time - 1 minute EffectAoE5 mile radius, centered on casterDuration5 minutesSaveReflex You alter the composition of the heavens in such a way to mimic the effect of a solar eclipse. All creatures caught in the radius of the spell when it is first cast without proper eye protection are blinded for the duration of the spell (reflex reduces to 1 round). Creatures in the spells radius take a -4 penalty on perception even if they aren't blinded. What constitutes protection either covers the eyes completely, or are glasses specifically designed to block the powerful light of the eclipse. The caster can create a pair of these glasses for 100g. Solar eclipse ends automatically if lunar eclipse is cast in its range, cancelling each other out. All weather inducing spells do not function underground.

entries.title: README
entries.content: Mother Earth The oldest of all the deities and the creator goddess. Mother Earth is interested in the constant struggle between nature and those who would seek its destruction or exploitation. The proliferation of life and balance between all living things are what her followers preach. Mother Earth spells primarily manipulate plants, animals and other aspects of nature to aid those who seek to protect it.

entries.title: foxdie
entries.content: Foxdie Foxdie Nack 1 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange30 ftDuration1 minute You summon a relatively average looking fox at a point you can see. At your command, you can cause it to make noises typical fox. After which, it explodes violently in a tiny fiery mushroom cloud. This does not cause damage to anybody or anything, nor does it dirty anything. If you do not cause it to make noise, it disappears within 1 minute.

entries.title: pants
entries.content: Pants Pants Nack 1 Cast Time - 1 Standard Action EffectRange30 ftTarget1 creature You undo belts, buttons and zippers on a creature's pants as they are forcefully removed and folded into a pile next to them. This spell does not work when used against heavily armored targets.

The spell allows you to see through clothing/armor while it is worn by a creature.

entries.title: big-head-mode

This does not give you extra carry weight, strength, or destructive capabilities. It does not even increase your reach. You still possess the same exact weight. If you are targeted with a harmful effect, take damage or cease concentration, you immediately shrink back to your normal size.
